excerpt.es: API GraphQL con Django + Graphene para explorar y relacionar personajes, películas y planetas de Star Wars. Ingesta desde SWAPI, validaciones y tests.
excerpt.en: GraphQL API with Django + Graphene to explore and relate Star Wars characters, films, and planets. SWAPI ingestion, validations, and automated tests.

description.es: API GraphQL con Django 4 + Graphene para consultar, crear y relacionar entidades del universo Star Wars. Incluye carga de datos desde SWAPI mediante comando de gestión, mutaciones con validación, y filtros/paginación estilo Relay. Historial de cambios con django-simple-history, tests con Pytest y CI en GitHub Actions. Despliegue en Docker con Gunicorn/Whitenoise; endpoint /graphql con GraphiQL
description.en: GraphQL API using Django 4 + Graphene to query, create, and relate Star Wars entities. Includes SWAPI data loading via a management command, validated mutations, and Relay‑style filtering/pagination. Change history with django-simple-history, Pytest tests, and GitHub Actions CI. Deployed with Docker using Gunicorn/Whitenoise; /graphql endpoint with GraphiQL.
